beans.description:
This (contrived) adaptor does the following...
* reads lines from stdin * prefixes "hello" to the front * writes to stdout
It is designed to illustrate the use of scripts within openadaptor. It also shows how scripts may include logging statements.
It may be invoked as follows:
java org.openadaptor.spring.SpringAdaptor -config javascript.xml
The classpath should include the following:
lib lib/openadaptor.jar lib/openadaptor-spring.jar lib/openadaptor-depends.jar
When launched, it will wait for command line input.
type something like this...
Dolly
...and it should be converted to something like this...
hello mum!
